text: A sea serpent or sea dragon is a type of dragon sea monster described in a number of mythologies. The most well-known myths are Mesopotamian (Tiamat), Judeo-Christian (Leviathan), Greek (Cetus, Echidna, Hydra, Scylla), and Norse or Scandinavian (JÃ¶rmungandr, Kraken). == Related pages == * Legendary creature * Loch Ness Monster * Giant squid * Sea monster ==References== Category:Dragons
title: Sea serpent
